meanings.definition: To cause someone to believe or feel certain about something
meanings.sent1: She convinces her friend that the movie is worth watching.
meanings.sent2: He convinces his parents to let him go to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat convinces the dog to share the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: The colorful illustrations in the book convinces children to read more.
meanings.sent5: The evidence convinces the jury of the defendant's innocence.

meanings.definition: To persuade someone to do something
meanings.sent1: The salesman convinces the customer to buy the new product.
meanings.sent2: She convinces her brother to help her with the chores.
meanings.sent3: The magician convinces the audience that he can make things disappear.
meanings.sent4: His determination convinces others to follow his lead.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies convinces him to enter the bakery.
